members.member:
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— VAR: exceptionResponseBuilder. USE: Method delegate for building an exception response.
Method delegate type must be ExceptionResponseBuilder.
Response must be written into response object passed. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— CTOR: GlobalExceptionMiddleware TASK: Constructs a GlobalExceptionMiddleware object.
This is called per request by the .Net Web API.
ARGS: nextMiddleWare : RequestDelegate : Next middleware delegate to invoke. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
